issue.title: [Python] Integer conversion failures with python 3.10
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14312](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14312). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We have conversion issues during testing the python wheels for 3.10:
https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/3882292730?check_suite_focus=true#step:8:658

Some of the failures should be related to the removed `__int__` method:
https://docs.python.org/3/whatsnew/3.10.html#removed

cc `[~apitrou]`
